name: Beyond The Lens
description:
Explore

Controls:
WSAD: Walk around
Shift: Sprint
Ctrl: Crouch
Mouse: Look around
Right Mouse Button: Zoom in
Left Mouse Button: Take photo
K: Take Photo
Esc: Quit

Check the Photos folder to discover what you've captured!
Windows: Same folder you unzipped the game
MacOS: ~/Library/Application Support/com.SeionLabs.BeyondTheLens/

Share your results! (use #GauGAN on Twitter)
